raya thaniwa ma nil ahasaka pahaya randunu mathaka maki yana wita hada gewunu gamane piya satahan wiyakeyi kalaya atha hara sunil gowinnage 2008 sapthambar 30) (jundalap, batahira oste්raliyawa) ganga lesin ada dumbauru wu me nadiya asirimath ekak bawa asuwemi kuda kala mulu lowa ma wenas wi mahalu wana yugayak ya nila daniyub nadiya dumbauru wi atha medina nil diyak penennata nomatha as manayaka nil nadiya lesa asu ganga wenas wi me dina ragena yannata pamini nila daniyub mathaka ma sitina gam ratata mata nohaka gena yanna mahalu wu me nadiya asirimath natha me dina kalani ganga mata ee ratawala parlimenthu manthriwarun path karannata pawa demala dayas porawata balayak thiyenawa.
ema iparani siwuwaram rajadaruwan pilibanda thorathuru wimasa balima mema lipiye aramuna we.
mahela ha sanga atharin kridakayek lesa sanga idiriyen sitina bawa piligannata ma sudanam natha.
samahara aya prashna kala foram eke samahara thibuna dewal ayin kale ayi kiyala.ehema kara thibenneth sarwar lod eka dan me pawichchi karana ekata daraganna bari nisa.
obe sarthakathwaya kadinam kirimata awashya nam, obe asamanya prathipala laba ganimata obata sahaya wana lesa puhunu wanna.
un kiyanne sinhalayan wanda wena ganata wenath jathin thama wargaya bokaramin pawathina bawa ya.
awurudu wisi pahakata withara passe parana yaluwek dakka wageyi . . . .
namuth me sillatath wada wadagath wana deyak atha.
anawaki kiyanniyak da?

ehi pradhana widyagnya saumya swaminadan kiya sitiye pudgalayin wadi washayen ennathkaranayata lak kara athi brithanya saha jarmaniya wani ratawalada indiyanu delta prabhedaya me wanawita sigra lesa pathira yana bawayi.
eeda wachanayata pamanak sima wu randu saruwal ada wana wita wedi undayakin nimawata pathwethi.
guru sewa wyawasthawe itha pahadiliwa dakwa thiyanawa wiwidha shreniwala sitiya yuthu sewaka anupathaya.
eeth kamkaru panthi deshapalanayak awashyayi.

melesa oostreliyawa bala yamata siti shri lankikayin athara kanthawan 9 deneku saha kuda daruwan pas deneku siti bawa kiyubranch polisiya pawasayi.
yuwa liwin in weri lakshari layif.

ranil wikramasinha mahathata agramathyawaraya washayen kriya kirimata parlimenthuwe wishwasaya uparima washayen athi bawata wana yojanawa ada parlimenthu nyaya pathrayata athulath kara athi bawa sandahan we.
mema pilithure oba sakdew ha maradewputh gana kiya athi de hariya.
pa්rasad marunu aaranchiya aragenayi ayiya aawe.
mahawansayata anuwa budugos himiyan wada wisu ganthakara wiharaya ekala thibu pothgulak bawada kiwa hakiya.
aliya mokada karanda ooni, uuge ara tokan eka denda ooni rilawata.
mama aden watuna nisa beheth gannane me gaha kapanna siddawune .
api me tharagawaliyata ena wita hama kenekma hadawathinma mahansi wi puhunuwim karala thamayi tharagawaliyata aawe.”
"api lankawe lokuma, dirgha, samakami, aandu wirodhaya sanwidhanaya kala, lokema ee gana katha wenawa.
aya dushanaya kara mara damanu labanne eyin hariyatama sathiyak giya thana okthobar 7 wanida ya.
merata hamudawa rate dushkara awasthawaladi thama sahaya nomandawa laba denna katayuthu kala.
kshathriyo kopamana agane dayi wimasuha.
thamanta hithawath piris athi karagannawa.
shri lanka saha pakisthanu krikat palaka mandala wala wirodhaya madhyaye ada me yojana sammatha wuna.
ehema eewath thibunu than mama ahala thiyenawa.
ema nisa ma me deya pawasanne ek siddhiyak padaka karagena bawa nosithanna.
– aththatama kiwwoth oya amerikawe loka welanda madhyasthanayata gahapu ekath plan kale oya degollone.eeta passe thama eeka alkayida ekata bara dunne kriyathmaka karanna.
ekalhi mahath wu bhumikampawak athi wiya.
‘ohege minissu atharen ganu lamayek hoyaganna bayi kiyana eka wenna puluwan deyakda?
moko mama nodanne..
anika punchi pawul.
anathuruwa mema jawarama pilibandawa karunu thahawurukara gath ukussa paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariyata me sambandhayen danumdimen pasu owun samanga ema sthanayata giyeya.
widuli sandesha sankhyatha lokaye salakenneda itha adhika milakata wendesiye wikiniya yuthu mahajanayata ayath simitha sampathak lesaya.
namuth maha loku wedanawak hithe athi wenawa.
me widihata ratak ilakka kirima nusudusu bawath ohu penwa dunna.
mama me kathawa nishange post eke kament ekak damma..
lokaye kisidu ratakata hudekalawa pawathiya no haki ya.
ee mohu ruhunu sewaye krida anshaye niwedakayek nisada yayi nodani.
aagamika prakashanaye nidahasa awadharanaya karamin, prathi-thrasthawada wyawasthawa yatathe sanniwedana ayithiwasikam sima kirima
eeth asampurna gathiyak danenawa.

sharira sthula kirima, shariraya sobhamanawath kirima, kiri mawuwarun kiri erima wadiwima, kiri pirisidu kirima, daruwan bihikirimedi gabini mathawanta apahasuthawakin thorawa daruwa bihikirimata shakthiya labadima, mathaka shakthiya wadikirima, aayusha wadi kirima, dharana shakthiya wadi kirimatada aayurwediya washayen gunathmakabhawaya lesa sandahan karana athara pilika roga mardanayatada behewin iwahalwe.
lankawa jiwath wenna nusudusu ratak kiyala hithan katayuthu karana ayata thaman kamathi ratakata ya gannath hambu weyi...

ee wagema dewani adiyare tharagawaliya diwa rathri tharagawaliyak lesa pawathwamin ragar kridakayanta wagema krida lolintath nomanda aashwadayak laba dimata katayuthu kala.shri lanka inshuwarans samagame anugrahakathwayen pawathi me tharagawaliya narambaimata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha saha shiranthi rajapaksha mathiniya ekwi siti athara mathi amathiwaru rasak da me awasthawata sahabhagi wuna.
api hotalaye idan ehe mehe awidde eewaye.
namuth mage langa aasanaya his na.
bas ratha yanne res.
eya oyage muna aduranawa.
enam shri lanka kandayame puhunu karuwan washayen warin wara sewaya kala pahatha ayawalun siyalu denama shri lankawe purawasiyanda yannayi.
diyunu wana kolambaa nagaraye wagakima kanthawanta baradimata ma sudanam.
hik sirawatama ne..,!!
ratema awadhanaya yomuwu brigediyar priyanka hadisiyema meratata kandawayi
jeb nagaraya ikmanin sanwardhanaya wenne singappuruwa nisa thamayi kiyalayi kiyanne.

mata kawuruth anagathe gana kiyala denna oone na.
umbaata bayida mata ekak set...
ade eeth umbaamane....
ithin ayiyage ee yojanawa piliganna nangi ayiyata mama kamathi yayi dewarak nositha kiyanu atha.

ee anuwa labana desambar masa pawathwena adhyayana podu sahathika pathra samanyapela wibhagaye prathipala da keti kalayak thula nikuth kirimata apekshitha bawa da ehidiwibhaga komasariswaraya prakasha kaleya.

pot siti athi kirima.
yamekuta kiyanna puluwan meya duppath-pohosath kama pilibanda prashnayak pamanakya kiyala.
hettiaarachchi mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.
api adatath katha karanawa.
”ehenam ayi ?
eeye dawasa tharam
eka issarahin nathara karala fon eke layin eke thiyagena mayi,rambaukayi,wasanthayi, kapila ayiyayi
me thiyenne eda jayasiri ayya wechcha alakalanchiya wides siththara silpiya dakka widiha.
meya widya sanniwedanaya ha adhyapanayata da balapannaki.
(a)mantha්riwarayan ek peliyen peliya bagin thama sthanawalin nagi sita sabhawa idiriye thibena yojanawata pakshawa ho wiruddhawa chandaya bhawitha kirima, ganan kirimen karanu labiya yuthu ya;
ayiya malliwath aran paris walata panala yanawa...

dekin ekakin kohomath yanawa)!

oba mulumahath jathiyama agadayata adagena gos awasanaya.
namuth mama meya wyaparayak lesa nowe sewayak lesayi sidukaranne.
nirikshana kihipayak mema ghathanawala sawistharathmaka thorathuruwalin ithama...
ochcharayi ee gana thiyenne , eekayi mama ahanne chanal 4 widiyo baluwada kiyala ?
wilpaththuwa yanu miliyana 25kata eha ithihasayakata sakshi penwana sthanayak.
mage me winaya me dharmaya mepamana warsha gananakataya, in idiriyata me dharmaya ha winaya awalanguya kiya budurajanan wahanse wisin aagnyawak pihituwa natha.
ithuru pirisa liyana eka gana kalakirila eeka nawaththala.
nube kawi hithata wahan wela huga kalayak inna ba.
eeta passe kenek, thaman liwwe siriyas deyak da nadda kiyana eka bala ganima sandaha eya ajith parakum jayasinha ta penwiya yuthuya.me gana digin digata ma liwime therumak natha.
putha meka aran yanna mage gane awuruddata paththu karanna.
nathnam eeka samanya deyak kiyala hithana nisada?
me andamata al si da silwa mahathage manthri dhura kalaya athulatha ohu pasal 17kata warinwara maru karamin ohuta hirihara kaleya.
man mukuth kiyanna oone na...

sthuthiyi po ku.
thawath saralawa kiwahoth, samajiya yatharthayeth, manasika yatharthayeth mulaya ekama thanakin awasan weyi.
manasika roga manasika pidana ho manasika roga pilibimbau karana hasirim / athdakim gana karana adh yayanaya mano w yadhi wid yawayi.

gowinge aswanuwalata milak nathi wime prashnayata meya wisandumak da?

janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha mathiwarana nithi ullanghanaya karamin katayuthu karana bawata swadhina madhyawedi kusal perera mahatha shri lanka mathiwarana komishan sabhawata danum di atha.

marsidis kandayame luwis hamiltanta pamanak dewani wemin puhunu adiyara thuna nima kala botas sudusukam labime adiyaredi hamiltan dewani sthanaya dakwa ada damimata samath wiya.
aakayiw web adawiyata idiripath karana lipi eeniya samalochitha sangarawala pala kala yuthu bawata nithiyak natha.
aadayam badu departhamenthuwata kala hakiyi, ihala balapam nathnam.
ema wasida nothaka wishala janathawak ema raliyata sahabhagi wi sitima kageth kathabahata lakwiya.
